ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Sorry I havent posted for a while. I ve been doing my dream job for a few days (no not wrestling) babysitting dogs :) Tommorow I should be around more

OOC: Sorry I havent posted for a while. I've been doing my dream job for
a few days (no not wrestling) babysitting dogs :) Tommorow I should be
around more often.

BIC:
Megatron and Speedbreaker exit Astroblast. Megatron stays in the
hatchway, but Speedbreaker joins his comerades.

Motormaster floats out of the way of the plasma blast, as he tries to
head towards Megatron, but he dosent see the explosive shells coming
towards him. The impact creates a hug explosion in mid air, and out of
the explosion appears Motormaster who plunges to the ground. He strains
to get up, and through wheezing breath he salute Megatron.

Wildrider, strugles to get up, and transforms, the side of the car that
turns into his shoulder is damaged. "Come with me if you want to live
your destiny Shockwave" he says, as he roars off.

Megatron receives the information from the Avian, but he was busy right
now. He stepped over to Astroblasts controls, and turned on the speakers
(this isnt a radio wave, it's a normal speaker, so it just intensifies
the noise). "SURGITAL" it boomed over the battle field. "GET OVER HERE,
MEGATRON COMMANDS IT". He then looked down at the Stunticons. "MERGE" he
ordered. 

Motormaster hearing this stepped forward. "Stunticons, transform, and
start your engines" he ordered, as he Speedbreaker and Wildrider 
transformed into car mode, and began to rev their engines.
